statements: UPDATE health_records SET health_condition='Recovered' WHERE record_id=1;
UPDATE health_records SET patient_name='John Doe', date_of_birth='1995-06-15' WHERE record_id=2;
UPDATE health_records SET health_condition='Recovered' WHERE patient_id=101 AND record_id=1;
UPDATE health_records SET date_of_birth='1990-05-15', patient_name='John Doe' WHERE record_id=2;
UPDATE PatientRecords SET gender = 'Male' WHERE patient_id = 101;
UPDATE MedicalTests SET result = 'Negative' WHERE test_id = 201;
UPDATE PatientRecords SET patient_name = 'John Doe', diagnosis = 'Fever' WHERE patient_id = 101;
UPDATE MedicalTests SET test_name = 'Blood Test', result = 'Normal' WHERE patient_id = 102 AND test_date = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE Patients SET address='123 Main Street' WHERE patient_id=1;
UPDATE LabResults SET value=8.5, unit='mg/dL' WHERE result_id=3;
UPDATE Patients SET address = '123 Main St, Apt 101' WHERE patient_id = 1;
UPDATE LabResults SET normal_range = '0.5 - 1.5' WHERE result_id = 3;
UPDATE Patients SET gender = 'Male', contact_number = '555-1234' WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Visits SET health_condition = 'Fever', treatment = 'Rest and fluids' WHERE visit_id = '789e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Patients SET contact_number = '+1234567890' WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Medications SET dosage = '2 pills daily', prescribing_doctor = 'Dr. Smith' WHERE medication_id = '111e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE patients SET age = 30, patient_name = 'John Doe' WHERE patient_id = 1;
UPDATE health_records SET treatment = 'Physical Therapy' WHERE diagnosis = 'Back Pain';
UPDATE patients SET age = 25, gender = 'Female' WHERE patient_id = 123;
UPDATE health_records SET diagnosis = 'Hypertension', treatment = 'Medication A' WHERE patient_id = 456;
